message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.

I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get as close to my target price of $8,000 as possible.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me to consider.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This price reflects the value of the product while still giving you a great deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make another counteroffer of $11,500. I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to get closer to my target price of $8,000.
